#summary Using NetBeans Dialogs

= Introduction =

As a more flexible alternative to {{{JOptionPane}}}, the NetBeans Platform provides the [http://bits.netbeans.org/dev/javadoc/index.html Dialogs API] for handling alerts, notifications, and messages to the user. 

= In CashForward =

DialogDescriptor and NotifyDescriptor are used to ask for information, confirmation, and display problems.

The Dialogs API is quite flexible: 

{{{
final DialogDescriptor dd =
                new DialogDescriptor(paymentDetailPanel,
                getMessage("CTL_NewPaymentTitle"));
}}}
